assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Erin G. Sutcliffe, Amanda Bartenbaker Thompson, Megan L. Marshall, Maegan E. Roberts, Lisa R. Susswein, Ying Wang are employed by GeneDx/BioReference Laboratories, Inc./OPKO Health, and have salary as the only disclosure. Kathleen S. Hruska, Benjamin D. Solomon are employed by and have stock ownership or options in GeneDx/BioReference Laboratories, Inc./OPKO Health. Amy R. Stettner and Rachel T. Klein have no conflicts of interest to disclose.
